loonR 0.2.15
  • Reference

    Calibration plot

    Source: R/DCA.R
    riskCalibrationPlotSingleComplex.Rd

    Calibration plot

    riskCalibrationPlotSingleComplex(risk, label, color = "#4682B4", bins = 10)

    Arguments

    risk

    Should be risk probability

    bins

    Default 10

    Value

    Examples

    data("LIRI")
risk = LIRI$ANLN
risk = loonR::logit2prob(scale(risk))
label = LIRI$status
loonR::riskCalibrationPlotSingleComplex(risk, label)
